title: What is Dalilah's Law? Trump seeks license ban for illegal immigrants after Indian-origin driver case
summary_full: US President Trump has proposed "Dalilah's Law," aiming to prevent states from granting driver's licenses to undocumented immigrants. The legislation is named after Dalilah Coleman, a young girl severely injured in a crash allegedly caused by an undocumented truck driver. Trump also advocated for stricter criminal justice reforms, emphasizing keeping repeat offenders incarcerated.
